articleList.title: Android Html view with CSS, Java Script
Android Html View with CSS
articleList.url: <html> < head > < style > body { background-color: #d0e4fe;} h1 { color: orange; text-align: center;} p {font-family: "Times New Roman";font-size: 20 px;} < /style> <script> alert("hello world"); </script> < /head > < body >< h1 > My First CSS Example < /h1> < p > This is a paragraph. < /p ></body> < /html >
